review: Great product. I bought this so my daughter could watch her cartoons in another room. It works great, hd picture quality, no speed issues. I've actually had better luck with the fire tv than I've had with my vizio smart tv. And you can take it with you when you travel and enjoy Amazon prime and Netflix in your hotel room. The voice control works good and picks up voice commands correctly.

review: Good for movies. Realtime tv, if you like being there on time on schedule only 2 watch, its fair. If you are used to a DVR, it sucks unless you buy series after series. Sling TV gives you the networks (25$ a month), but no "watch on demand".  And FORGET FAST FORWARDIND THROUGH COMERCIALS!  Not a total replacement to satellite  unless you live in front of a TV and like commercials. :-(
